description: Component for counting characters typed inside a form element
deprecationMessage: Deprecated in ui-ang@11. To be made into a private component which is used in `bb-textarea-ui` and `bb-rich-text-editor-ui` in ui-ang@13.

blockTyping.description: Whether the element should be blocked when maximum character count is reached.

element.description: The element reference which the characters are typed in.

inputValue.description: Passed value from parent input, it gives option to count char event if value was programmatically changed

limitExceededText.description: Additional text to display when when maximum character count has been exceeded. Defaults to ''.
